entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
